story_parts.text: Joe the giraffe goes on a hike. He walks through the woods and sees many different animals. He sees a deer, a rabbit, and a squirrel. He also sees a lot of birds. He walks for a long time and then he comes to a river. He drinks some water and then he continues on his hike. He walks for a while longer and then he comes to a hill. He climbs to the top of the hill and then he sees a beautiful view. He sees

next_options.0: Joe sees a beautiful sunset and decides to camp there for the night
next_options.1: Joe sees a bear and starts to run away

story_parts.text: Joe sees a bear and starts to run away. He runs as fast as he can, but the bear is faster than him. The bear catches up to Joe and starts to attack him. Joe fights back, but he is no match for the bear. The bear kills Joe and eats him.

next_options.0: The bear continues to attack other people in the area
next_options.1: The bear wanders off into the forest

story_parts.text: The bear wanders off into the forest, full from its meal. It wanders through the woods, looking for more food. It comes across a deer, but it is too fast for the bear to catch. The bear continues to wander through the woods until it comes across a small rabbit. The bear catches the rabbit and eats it. The bear is now full and it wanders back to its den for a nap.

next_options.0: The bear wanders back to its den and falls asleep
next_options.1: The bear keeps wandering through the woods and comes across a stream
